mapper.select: SELECT *, IFNULL(M.nickname, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer, B.name AS extra__board FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberNum = M.num LEFT JOIN `board` AS B ON A.boardNum = B.num WHERE A.num = #{num}

SELECT * FROM article WHERE 1
AND title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%')
AND body LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, B.name AS extra__board FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberNum = M.num LEFT JOIN `board` AS B ON A.boardNum = B.num WHERE 1
AND A.boardNum = #{boardNum}
AND title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%')
AND body LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY num DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{limitTake}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}, `memberNum` = #{memberNum}, `boardNum` = #{boardNum}
